rows.label: bf02100100_0010
rows.name: Oh my goodness. What a wonderful view!

rows.label: bf02100100_0030
rows.name:
Yeah, this is great! Especially after slumming it
on Gramps's back for so long!

rows.label: bf02100100_0040
rows.name: Hmph. It served you well enough!

rows.label: bf02100100_0050
rows.name:
Over there, that's Trigo. Biggest
city in Gula.

rows.label: bf02100100_0060
rows.name:
I'll accompany you as far as the city.
After that, I'm afraid you're on your own.

rows.label: bf02100100_0080
rows.name:
Of course. I would have thought even you'd know
why I can't be seen with you.

rows.label: bf02100100_0090
rows.name:
Because you're supposed to
be one of them?

rows.label: bf02100100_0100
rows.name:
I haven't known them very long, but you know.
They're still my crew.

rows.label: bf02100100_0110
rows.name:
Your crew? Even after they tried
to kill you?

rows.label: bf02100100_0120
rows.name:
That's as may be, but they're the
closest thing I have to a family.
